Text: is this the actual installer or just an update?
This updates the sims 3 and installs seasons
Plz seed this im getting 0.1 kbs
1 seeders , 70 leechers ? Installation will finish next year , if possible . please seed .

if you have mods, update or delete them. also go to documents/electronic arts/the sims 3 and delete DCCache, IGACache, SigsCache folders and CASPartCache, compositorCache, scriptCache, simCompositorCache, socialCache package files.
^^^^Before or after we install the game?
only if the game crashes on you. sometimes removing mods and clearing the cache fixes it.
Downloaded, installed the game kept crashing, deleted the files you had said and it's working perfectly now. I still have the program open so it can seed. Thanks!

So I downloaded and installed. I deleted my mods and the things you said but when I pull the screen up its missing all the writing. I can't make a new neighborhood (had to delete my old one cause the mods weren't updated) When I go to pick a neighborhood some of them are missing their stories (Moonlight Falls is one of them) I tried getting onto one of my families (before deletion) and the log on to your sims account popped up with the lil unchecked box but there was nothing inside it.
